result.title: AIDOaRt AI-Augmented toolkit - initial vers
result.description: This deliverable will provide the initial version of the AI-augmented tool set as developed in the context of WP4. Relying on the propositions from WP2 and WP4, the support offered by the provided tools will notably cover the features expected by the AIDOaRtuse cases providers in terms of AIOPS for requirements, monitoring, modelling, coding, and testing in the context of DevOps.

result.title: AIDOaRt AI-Augmented toolkit - final vers.
result.description: This deliverable represents the final iteration of the AI-augmented tool set developed in the context of WP4. This final version of the tool set will be the one actually deployed and used in the context of the AIDOaRt use cases.

result.title: AIDOaRt Core Infrastructure and Framework - initial vers.
result.description: This deliverable provides the specifications of the AIDOaRt Core Infrastructure and Framework as designed and developed in Tasks 32 33 and 34 The objective is to provide the general infrastructure modelbased framework and associated core services composing the AIDOaRt platform At this stage the specifications and some corresponding prototypes are provided to the use case providers for early experimentations
